
{{Client function}}
This function resets the firing rate of a [[/Element/Weapon.md|custom weapon]] to the default one.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool resetWeaponFiringRate ( weapon theWeapon )</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/Element/Weapon.md|weapon]]:resetFiringRate}}

===Required Arguments===
* '''theWeapon:''' the weapon to reset the firing rate of.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' on success, ''false'' otherwise.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">local weapon = createWeapon ("mp5",0,0,10) 
resetWeaponFiringRate (weapon)
</syntaxhighlight>

==Requirements==
{{Requirements|n/a|1.3.0-9.04555|}}
